database.name: VIEW EFIN_ACCT_CHAPTER_REPORT_V2
database.view: SELECT e.c_elementvalue_id AS efin_acct_chapter_report_v2_id, e.ad_client_id, e.ad_org_id, e.isactive, e.created, e.createdby, e.updated, e.updatedby, (COALESCE(e.value, '') || ' - ') || e.name AS account, e.value, e.name, CASE WHEN e.value LIKE '21%' THEN '1' WHEN e.value LIKE '22%' THEN '2' WHEN e.value LIKE '23%' THEN '2' WHEN e.value LIKE '24%' THEN '2' WHEN e.value LIKE '25%' THEN '2' WHEN e.value LIKE '26%' THEN '2' WHEN e.value LIKE '27%' THEN '2' WHEN e.value LIKE '28%' THEN '2' WHEN e.value LIKE '3%' THEN '3' WHEN e.value LIKE '4%' THEN '4' ELSE '0' END AS chapter, e.em_efin_classification AS account_classification, e.accounttype, e.issummary, e.elementlevel FROM c_elementvalue e WHERE e.isactive = 'Y' AND e.elementlevel = 'S' AND e.value not LIKE '9%' AND e.value not LIKE '5%' AND (e.value NOT IN ('1', '2', '3', '4', '5', '6', '9')) ORDER BY e.value
